events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago and my package has still not arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days and I’m really concerned about the delay.
The reported problem has been identified as a delivery delay based on the customer's message regarding the package not arriving and tracking issues.
The case has been assigned to our customer support agent specialized in shipping and delivery issues to assist the customer further.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll do my best to help you track your order and resolve this delay.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID so I can check the current status with the shipping carrier?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the tracking number is ZX123456789US. The last update was a week ago, and nothing since then.
I've contacted the delivery service with your information and am monitoring the package location. We expect an update within 48 hours and will notify you immediately.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you taking swift action to look into this. I hope to receive news soon.
The delivery carrier has located your package and it is now out for delivery. Please expect your order by the end of today.
Just following up to ensure you received your package and that everything arrived in good condition. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your delivery issue has been resolved successfully, this case will now be closed. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
